collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (13 total Queries, 13 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT v.id_cliente) as total FROM venta v WHERE DATE_FORMAT(v.fecha_venta, '%Y-%m') = '2024-12' AND v.id_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT id_cliente FROM venta WHERE DATE_FORMAT(fecha_venta, '%Y-%m') < '2024-12' )

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT v.id_cliente) as total FROM venta v WHERE DATE_FORMAT(v.fecha_venta, '%Y-%m') = '2024-11' AND v.id_cliente NOT IN ( SELECT id_cliente FROM venta WHERE DATE_FORMAT(fecha_venta, '%Y-%m') < '2024-11' )

SELECT c.nombre as categoria, SUM(dv.cantidad * dv.precio_unitario) as total FROM detalle_venta dv JOIN producto p ON p.id_producto = dv.id_producto JOIN categoria c ON c.id_categoria = p.id_categoria JOIN venta v ON v.id_venta = dv.id_venta WHERE v.estado = 'completada' GROUP BY c.id_categoria ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT p.nombre, SUM(dv.cantidad) as cantidad_vendida, SUM(dv.cantidad * dv.precio_unitario) as total_ventas FROM detalle_venta dv JOIN producto p ON p.id_producto = dv.id_producto JOIN venta v ON v.id_venta = dv.id_venta WHERE v.estado = 'completada' GROUP BY p.id_producto ORDER BY cantidad_vendida DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT `venta`.*, `cliente`.`nombre` as `cliente_nombre`, `cliente`.`apellido` as `cliente_apellido`, (SELECT SUM(cantidad) FROM detalle_venta WHERE id_venta = venta.id_venta) as total_items FROM `venta` JOIN `cliente` ON `cliente`.`id_cliente` = `venta`.`id_cliente` ORDER BY `fecha_venta` DESC LIMIT 5
